name: Star Point
description:
Star Point is a minimalist game with original mechanics and beautiful design. Ride a planet to discover new colorful places in space full of constellations. Reach the finish quickly without falling out of constellations, and collect as many stars as possible! 

WEB/Standalone Controls:

  • Right Arrow/D - Move Forward
  • Up Arrow/W or Space - Jump
  • R - restart (available during pause, game over or finish)
  • N - next level (available during pause, game over or finish)
  • Mouse - menu interactions

Enjoy 45 colourful hand crafted levels. Collect stars and try each of 12 awesome planets available.
